title: website and blog: JavaScript error on golang.org in Safari
body: When visiting golang.org in Safari (8.0.8) on OS X (10.10.5) the featured articles are not displayed. There is a JavaScript error in the console. ``` [Error] TypeError: undefined is not a function (evaluating 's.startsWith(prefix)') personalizeInstallInstructions (godocs.js, line 251) (anonymous function) (godocs.js, line 311) k (jquery.min.js, line 2) fireWith (jquery.min.js, line 2) ready (jquery.min.js, line 2) D (jquery.min.js, line 2) ```
